participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. my favorite movie is friday. i'm now looking for a new job. i am a doctor.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: adventurous and easygoing, with a passion for exploring new cuisines and cultures.
participant_2.background: i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it. hey there i'm 23 and i love food.

content.text: Hey! Are you a doctor? Because I am.
I am great, how are you?
